description:
Centrally located in Manhattan, a short walk from every major train line (L,1,2,3,4,5,6,N,Q,R,A,C,E), and close to loads of bars, restaurants, and cafes. A great place for a couple looking for a conveniently located place in Manhattan for a getaway.

I will be away and will be unable to help out much. Keys will be passed off by a friend.
name: West Village Garden Apartment
review:
Jon's apartment was perfect for us! He was the best host; he greeted us early in the morning and graciously set us all up. The apartment was ideal and extremely clean, with an amazing private backyard. Location can't be beat in the heart of Greenwich Village with the best restaurants and shops down the street and picturesque scenes wherever you turn. 

Bottom line: Jon and this apartment were terrific and you should book it if you get the chance!
